title: Manager - Branding  & Content Development
tagsAndSkills: Branding,Adobe AfterEffects,Brand Management,Business promotion,Content Development,PowerPoint Designing,Graphic Designing,Photoshop
jobDescription:
Responsibilities :

- Managing the Branding & Creative Content Development department/ team of KVAT & Co and any of its Group Entities.

- Creating content for the firm for Marketing/ Business promotion purposes. Content could be in the form of flyers, posts, greetings, articles, etc.

- Creating and designing knowledge material, branding material, credential packs, capability decks, pitch decks, corporate profiles, brochures, internal and external PowerPoint presentations, posters, etc. for areas of services provided by the Firm and regarding any updates.

- Designing audit reports, proposal documents, study reports, townhall presentations, training material, internal guides, etc. for firm's business and branding.

- Creative designing of branding material for the firm like logos, letterheads, envelopes, merchandise, etc.

- Assist the firm, its Partners, and Associate Director - Business Strategy, Marketing & Content Development, HR & Administration of the Firm in Managing LinkedIn accounts, posts, and associated content on social media.

- Working on and implementing the right social media strategy for the firm to enhance business visibility.

- Advisory and implementation of new sources / avenues for push as well as pull marketing.

- Any other area as identified and mutually agreed upon by both the parties (firm and the team member) in the interest of Firm.

- Ensuring to learn all the necessary relevant skills required to do the assigned tasks well.

- Attending seminars/ training programs/ webinars/ internal and external knowledge sharing sessions.

Qualifications/ Skills:

- Bachelor's/Master's in Arts, or Mass Media and Communication or equivalent degree

- PowerPoint Designing

- Graphic Designing

- Photoshop

- Canva

- Adobe After Effects

- Premiere Pro

- Video Editing, Videography, Video production (not a must have skill)

- Photography (not a must have skill)

- Good communication

- Attention to detail

- Understanding of color palettes

- Market research

title: Senior Manager - Corporate Governance / Risk & Compliance
tagsAndSkills: Corporate Governance,Risk & Compliance,Audit,Excel,team management,Risk Management,Corporate,Senior management
jobDescription:
Responsibilities :

- Manage a team of 10 - 15 staff at least.

- Conduct team training and knowledge building sessions at least once a month.

- Multi - Tasking and Managing at least 3 to 4 clients at a time simultaneously with a team of at least 10 to 15 people.

- Report Status of Projects to Partner / Director/ Associate Director every 2 days in detailed manner.

- Manage projects end to end and ensure quality and timely deliverables/ outcomes.

- Initiate the projects and discuss schedule of Audit Committee meetings with Management Team.

- Plan and Execute Audit/ Project Kick off calls or Business Overview calls with client / Management Team.

- Attend business overview / walkthrough meetings with client.

- Align Team as per the required expertise and skills.

- Ensuring to thoroughly review the work output of team members before sending it out to the next level review.

- Prepare detailed Audit Program/ plan for each of the project and each quarter / month as per frequency and monitor the Project progress.

- Report to Partner in Charge for deviation in project progress against timeline

- Detailed briefing to team about expectations

- Co - ordinate with client SPOC / Stakeholders for data and information needed

- Timely escalation to CFO / Head - Audit / Any other SPOC allotted by client in case of delays in information receipt / non - cooperation by auditee.

- Conduct status meetings with clients every 15 days or as per project requirement for each project.

- Responsible to ensure Partner Review for any deliverable before releasing client at least 2 days in advance.

- Excellent PPT drafting and presentation skills.

- Excellent MS Excel skill.

- Guide and provide direction to the team for audits and value additions to client.

- Discussion of Draft findings with key stakeholders and convincing them for value additions / acceptance of observations

- Discuss audit findings and update to audit SPOC.

- Prepare Audit Committee / Board Presentations with Executive Summary and Key Findings

- Present audit reports to CXO levels

- Prepare proposals, pitch decks and case studies for presenting the same to client(s) and accompanying the management as and when required for proposal meetings.

- Identification of potential business opportunities at client place to build business and update Partner about the same.

- Ensuring to learn all the necessary relevant skills required to do the assigned tasks well.

- Ensuring to attend internal and external knowledge sharing sessions and ensuring your team attends the same.

- Attend regular Corporate Governance Seminars and CPE Hours of ICAI (Reimbursed by the Firm with due prior approvals).

title: Associate - eCommerce
tagsAndSkills: eCommerce,Campaign Management,Web Analytics,Digital Marketing,Marketing,Web technologies,Digital,Management
jobDescription:
Responsibilities :

- Manage and optimize the performance of multiple e-commerce platforms, including but not limited to our website, third-party marketplaces, and social commerce channels.

- Develop and execute strategic pricing and promotional strategies to drive sales, increase profitability, and maintain competitiveness in the market.

- Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) such as traffic, conversion rates, average order value, and revenue to identify opportunities for optimization and growth.

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and product management, to ensure alignment of e-commerce strategies with overall business objectives.

- Establish and nurture relationships with e-commerce platforms, marketplace partners, and other third-party vendors to optimize performance and explore new opportunities for growth.

- Research and evaluate emerging e-commerce trends, technologies, and best practices to inform strategic decision-making and maintain a competitive edge.

- Lead the planning and execution of new e-commerce channel launches, including coordinating with internal teams and external partners to ensure successful implementation.

- Conduct regular competitive analysis to identify market trends, pricing strategies, and promotional tactics used by competitors, and leverage insights to enhance our own ecommerce strategies.

- Stay informed about changes in e-commerce regulations, policies, and compliance requirements, and ensure that our e-commerce activities remain compliant with relevant laws and regulations.

- Provide regular reports and analysis on e-commerce performance, trends, and insights to senior management and relevant stakeholders.

Qualifications :

- 1-2 years experience handling e-comm platforms

- Proven experience in e-commerce management, preferably in a nutrition, or wellness environment.

- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, draw actionable insights, and make data-driven decisions.

- Excellent communication and negotiation skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with e-commerce platforms and third-party vendors.

- Proficiency in e-commerce platforms, content management systems, and analytics tools (e.g., Shopify, Magento, WooCommerce, Google Analytics).

- Demonstrated ability to develop and execute effective pricing strategies and campaigns to drive sales and profitability.

- Detail-oriented with strong organizational and problem-solving skills.

- Adaptability and willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and industry developments.

title: Business Analyst
tagsAndSkills: Business Analysis,technical requirements analysis,technical writing,project management,Data Visualization,Data Analytics,Technical analysis,Technical
jobDescription:
Responsibilities :

We are looking for a Business Analyst who is highly skilled in the space of EdTech (Preferred) to join and be part of an extremely motivated and passionate team, who can:

- Elicit, analyze, specify, and validate the business needs of stakeholders, be they customers or end users.

- Collaborate with project sponsors to determine project scope and vision.

- Perform requirements analysis.

- Work with stakeholders and project team to prioritize collected requirements.

- Develops and utilizes standard templates to accurately and concisely write requirements specifications.

- Develop Business Test Cases for testing the completeness of application from a business perspective

- Translate conceptual customer requirements into functional requirements in a clear manner that is comprehensible to developers/project team.

- Create process models, specifications, diagrams, and charts to provide direction to developers and/or the project team.

- Manage and track the status of requirements throughout the project lifecycle; enforce and redefine as necessary.

- Communicate changes, enhancements, and modifications of business requirements - verbally or through written documentation ; to project managers, sponsors, and other stakeholders so that issues and solutions are understood.

- Provides guidance and/or instruction to junior staff members.

- Being detail-oriented and capable of delivering a high level of accuracy

Business Analyst Qualifications / Skills :

- Able to exercise independent judgment and take action on it

- Excellent analytical, mathematical, and creative problem-solving skills

- Excellent listening, interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills

- Logical and efficient, with keen attention to detail

- Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks while under pressure

- Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment

- Proven capabilities in project and user-testing management

- Proven development of innovative and impactful systems solutions

- Extensive experience with data visualization

- Highly proficient technical writing capabilities

Education & Experience :

- University degree in the field of business administration (MBA Preferred)

- 5 to 8 years related work experience

- Proven experience with business and technical requirements analysis, elicitation, modelling, verification, and methodology development

- Demonstrated project management skills and project management software skills, including planning, organizing, and managing resources

- Excellent understanding of the organization's goals and objectives

- Prior experience of working in Universities/Institutions/Coaching classes would be an added advantage
